sourcesContent:
import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'

export default function useGetKingMoves(x, y) {
	const { gameField } = useSelector((store) => store.chess)

	if (gameField[y][x][1] !== 'K') return []

	const moves = [
		[x - 1, y - 1],
		[x - 1, y],
		[x - 1, y + 1],
		[x, y + 1],
		[x + 1, y - 1],
		[x, y - 1],
		[x + 1, y + 1],
		[x + 1, y],
	]

	return moves
}
